The goal of this puzzle is for your team to count from 1 to 100, without skipping or repeating any numbers.
The only thing randomized about the Firefly is when it chooses to chime in.
The creodont doesn't so much send its own messages as shout over everyone else's messages. It just wants you to sing along with it.
If you let the Owl time out while waiting for an answer, one of its angry messages triggers a miscount, and another doesn't.
The Viper could have taken a different snake name. The results of its backsolving process are much simpler than its logging messages make it look.
